title: Apple will no longer pay you as much for trading in its used products
content:
Apple has been trying to be more eco-friendly when it comes to the way it runs its operations. For example, it now resorts to smaller iPhone packages that exclude the charging brick. Another practice to battle climate change is its Trade In program. The company allows users to give up their eligible used devices to

The post Apple will no longer pay you as much for trading in its used products appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple has lowered the values for trading in Macs, iPads, and Apple Watches. iPhone values remain the same for the time being.
